data.title: David and Meg Robbins – FamilyLife®
data.meta_description: As 17-year veterans of Cru, David and Meg Robbins have served in a variety of capacities, beginning as ﬁeld staff at their Alma Mater, the University of Mississippi. In 2003, they moved to Pisa, Italy, to serve as overseas team leaders for Cru. It was during that time they fell… - FamilyLife®
data.text:
with David and Meg Robbins

Crave that forever love? David & Meg Robbins guide you through the twists and turns that marriage will bring. Rediscover the sweet moments from when you first met! View Show Notes →
